title: Mount Rainier National Park: Mountaineering Reports
body: Mountaineering Reports & Statistics       Annual Mountaineering Reports summarize highlights of the climbing program, including search-and-rescues, statistics, and climbing staff.  Mountaineering Report 2015  Mountaineering Report 2014  Mountaineering Report 2013  Mountaineering Report 2012  Mountaineering Report 2011  Mountaineering Report 2010  Mountaineering Report 2009   Mountaineering Report 2005   Mountaineering Report 2004   Summaries of climbing-related search-and-rescues that occurred in 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, and 2002 are located on the Search and Rescue Report page. Climbing Statistics are available from 1852 to 1897 and from 1950 to the present. Data available include the total number of climbers and the number of climbers who successfully reached the summit.
